title: Genetic diversity of Rhombomys opimus and Meriones meridianus with potential divergence of plague resistance in the Junggar Basin plague focus based on RT1-Db1*exon1
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Qiguo Wang, Wenting Mou, Tao Luo, Guliayi Baokaixi, Yongjun Luo, Maidina Xiaokaiti, Xiaowukaiti Saimaiti, Xinhui Wang, Junhui Hao, Youjun Gui, Xiaojun Wang, Haiyan Wu, Xijiang Wang
